Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel”

Reviews.Content: definitely budget hotels stayed staff veeery helpful location perfect clean nice comfortable perfect bathroom stayed february 2012 season price low stay recommend

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Brendon D
Reviews.Content: hotel value service especially roaming city front desk 247 staff knowledgeable gladly help direction location perfect block termini station recommend taking metro colosseum station inexpensive easier walking comfortable beds bathroom recommend adding breakfast stay inexpensive meal sightseeing breakfast coffee juice pastries rolls etc overall amazing stay hotel stay

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, cheap and fab location for sight seeing”
Reviews.Author: Oakley2012
Reviews.Content: stayed january nights boyfriend price night €40 hotel fab round corner station metro sightseeing buses stop termini excellent planning total toursit walking distance colosseum forum couple nice restaraunts nearby round corner nicest theres called nearby fab cocktail food pretty average expensive lovely staff including free wifi internet available hotel local slightly kings cross night city dweller youre unlikely worriedbut fair homeless people odd dark safe wouldnt carry alot cash etc dodgy hanging station didnt trouble dont theres deal evening apparently applies rome termini sightseeing day probably glad excuse earlyish night rest hotel nice fab price breakfast ok croissants stuff fill til lunch staff friendly cleaned equipped luxury expected price highly recommend

Reviews.Title: “Mariano - Good value & location.”
Reviews.Author: tiastias
Reviews.Content: stayed mariano jan 12 located 4min walk termini station heard alot negative comments enjoyed ghetto safe hotel grand flashy job 4th floor nice bathroom actv etc staff friendly map rome check location mariano 4min 10min colloseum 20min fontana di trevi etc walking distance stay mariano

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: nishababy77
Reviews.Content: friendly hotel staff willing directions 4min walk termini station major sites walkable distance ok bus links metro fantastically close hotel breaksfast morning bread biscuits selection coffes herbal teas hot chocolate service stayed 502 clean modern looking expect 4 5 stars nice 3 star hotel

Reviews.Title: “Perfect budget hotel for sightseeing in Rome!”
Reviews.Author: LimaYork
Reviews.Content: firstly budget 3 star hotel rome review mind expecting 4 5 star luxury yes maybe little bit run safe location perfect especially coming bus shuttle ciampino airport 5 mins bus stop metro termini corner brilliant transport rome chose walk takes 10 mins colloseum hotel staff helpful clean tea coffee facilities issue plenty breakfast overall clean maybe bit shabby italy bit run price pay paid £40 night december bb fault definitely stay bothered seeing sights spending time hotel prefer luxury spotless pay stay elsewhere people expect pay sometimes complain stupid

Reviews.Title: “Baited by another hotel, switched to this one”
Reviews.Author: Margaret A
Reviews.Content: hotel hotel kennedy moved arrived twisted ankle en route hotel ceilings husband advised soak ankle tub visibly dirty mold growing cry front desk ice looked seven heads water bottles minibar swelling ankle dirty luckily onenight stay slept top covers clothes dirty hole ceiling bed terribly uncomfortable husband woke times night limbs gone numb glad didnt stay hotel standards arent pretty bad enjoy continental breakfast morning especially blood orange juice

Reviews.Content: oddshaped 106 thin coffin lcoation train station walking distance major centre water shoer hot staff friendly didnt breakfast cant comment hair bed pulled covers odd blankets matress comfy air con views street youre choosing views hotels expensive rome cheapest short break fine base

Reviews.Title: “For people who will spend more time exploring Rome than in their room!”
Reviews.Author: luvlyliver
Reviews.Content: arrived late september 2011 stayed 4 nights explore rome walking hotel especially dark didnt impression inside realised clean runofthemill basic european city hotel hotel comfy bed air conditioning times balmy nights shower roomy pressured hot water woohoo breakfast 5 euros typical continental breakfast croissants bread cereals coffee staff helpful checking map told routes walk hotel chinese district town scary reviews read fabulous chinese restaraunt door look empty inviting try boyfriend meal 2 huge bottles beer paid 17 euros rome spend days clean bed shower handy location call base hesitate book hotel price isnt bad leaves money spend amazing ice cream

Reviews.Content: walkable distance termini easy staff friendly guys reception helpfull giving useful info directions smile clean tidy bathroom facilities found travel kettle useful front bedroom beds double single little noisy morning window bedrooms quiter overall time satisfied
